Evanston.Chicago Lakeshore Hospital:
Chicago Lakeshore Hospital is a private behavioral health and addiction treatment center located in the north side of the city of Chicago.
Chicago Lakeshore Hospital is a 108-bed facility that, in 2014, provided services to over 3,000 individuals. It provides treatment services to those struggling with alcoholism, chemical dependency and drug use, as well as including their families as an integral part of the multi-disciplinary team.
